Name: CREME BRULEE SUEDE
Notes: Premium Italian suede is here!!! Nothing beats the silky soft touch of this gorgeous Creme Brulee Suede - ideal for upholstery, handbags, and general leathercraft. The suede pictured on the table is not the exact piece you will receive but will be similar in size, color & shape. PLEASE NOTE: Suede does not have a protective topcoat & will need to be treated with stain protector if desired (available at most large retailers). Beautiful suede leather at an exceptional price! Approx Weight 3.0 oz/sq.ft. Approx Thickness: 1.2 mm
Important Note: Because our cowhides are premium top grain leather, natural markings such as brands, finished scratches / bites, and hump holes (a narrow slit along the spine) may OR may not be present. Typically, these markings are very subtle and are considered by most as the "signature" of fine leather. See our  leather yield  and  natural markings  pages to learn more about what you should expect when buying a leather hide.
